BusinessName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: EAST TEXAS LIGHTHOUSE FOR THE BLIND

IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: Empowering blind Americans through rehabilitation, education, training, and employment
IRS990.MissionDesc: The purpose of the East Texas Lighthouse for the Blind shall be the rehabilitation, education, training and employment of people who are blind, visually impaired, and/or otherwise disabled and the furtherance of their interest and welfare through programs designed to provide rehabilitation, training, and employment opportunities, being wholly charitable and benevolent.
IRS990.Desc: MANUFACTURING EMPLOYMENT - FURTHERS THE MISSION OF THE ORGANIZATION THROUGH THE FOLLOWING SUB-PROGRAMS: HORIZON INDUSTRIES, LIGHTHOUSE GRAPHICS. HORIZON INDUSTRIES PROVIDES EMPLOYMENT FOR ADULTS WHO ARE BLIND OR VISUALLY IMPAIRED. LIGHTHOUSE GRAPHICS PROVIDES VOCATIONAL TRAINING AND EMPLOYMENT FOR ADULTS WHO ARE BLIND OR VISUALLY IMPAIRED. LIGHTHOUSE GRAPHICS PRODUCES AND SELLS CUSTOM PRINTED AND EMBROIDERED CLOTHING. In the fiscal year 2018, 78 people were employed at Horizon Manufacturing, with sales of $19.2 million.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: REHABILITATION SERVICES - FURTHERS THE MISSION OF THE ORGANIZATION THROUGH THE FOLLOWING SUB-PROGRAMS: EAST TEXAS LIGHTHOUSE FOR THE BLIND SCHOLARSHIP PROGRAM, CLIENT SERVICES, LOW VISION AIDS STORE. THE SCHOLARSHIP COMMITTEE SUBSIDIZES ADAPTIVE TECHNOLOGY PURCHASES AND PROVIDES SCHOLARSHIPS FOR POST-SECONDARY EDUCATION FOR BLIND AND VISUALLY IMPAIRED PERSONS. CLIENT SERVICES PROVIDES REHABILITATION AND TRAINING SERVICES TO BLIND AND VISUALLY IMPAIRED PERSONS TO ASSIST THEM IN BECOMING MORE SELF-SUFFICIENT. LOW VISION AIDS STORE PROVIDES ADDITIONAL EMPLOYMENT OPPORTUNITIES FOR ADULTS WHO ARE BLIND OR VISUALLY IMPAIRED. THE STORE SERVES THE BLIND COMMUNITY BY PROVIDING INCREASED ACCESS TO SPECIALTY LOW-VISION AIDS. In 2018, 338 clients were served, 322 eye exams were provided, 317 pairs of glasses were given out, $68,000 worth of scholarships were granted and 175 grants for adaptive equipment worth $107,000 were issued.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: The organization has adopted the provisions of FASB ASC 740-10, (FASB Interpretation No. 48, Accounting for Uncertainty in Income Taxes). The Organization records a liability for uncertain tax positions when it is probable that a loss has been incurred and the amount can be reasonably estimated. We continually evaluate expiring statutes of limitations, audits, proposed settlements, changes in tax law and new authoritative rulings.

Form 990, Part VI, Line 11b: Form 990 Review Process
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: The Form 990 will be presented to the board of directors and the finance committee.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Line 12c: Explanation of Monitoring and Enforcement of Conflicts
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: The board of directors submits disclosure forms requiring them to disclose any potential conflict of interest. The forms are reviewed by the executive committee.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Line 15a: Compensation Review & Approval Process - CEO, Top Management
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: All compensation is determined by the executive committee in accordance with written policies.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: All compensation is determined by the executive committee in accordance with written policies.
